    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Application
    The application serves as an OAuth2 Resource Server.
    BearerTokenInterceptor
    The Bearer Token Interceptor to include the Bearer token in the request headers.
    ClassificationLevel
    Represents four classification levels, ordered from the weakest to the strongest classification.
    DocumentController
    REST controller for managing document classifications and access levels.
    DocumentService
    Provides access to the next resource server within this local service.
    KeycloakJwtAuthenticationConverter
    JWT Authentication Converter for Keycloak.
    ResourceServerConfiguration
    The security configuration.
    ResourceServerInfoController
    The resource server info controller.
